Frequently Asked Questions

Do you offer personalized travel planning?

Yes! I offer custom travel planning services including itinerary creation, destination recommendations, and budget planning.

Can you help with travel photography?

Absolutely! I offer photography workshops, one-on-one coaching, and can recommend the best spots for photos in various destinations.

Do you accept sponsored content?

I'm selective about partnerships and only work with brands that align with my values and would genuinely benefit my audience.

Are you available for speaking events?

Yes, I speak at travel conferences, universities, and corporate events about travel, photography, and digital nomad lifestyle.
